settings.integrationSettings.dbtCloudSet:
Are you sure you want to remove your dbt Service Token? 
 
This will stop all dbt Cloud transformations from running and may cause sync failures.  You will need to manually remove these transformations from your connections to keep syncing.
This workspace has an existing dbt service token.  To replace it, you must first remove the existing token.
To use the dbt Cloud integration, enter your service token here. <lnk>Learn more</lnk>.
